applyDiscountTo.value.description: Set to apply discount to first sale only or to all sales.
applyDiscountTo.value.displayName: Each Customer Can Use The Promotion
applyDiscountTo.value.name: applyDiscountTo.value

code.description: Set the name of the promotion code.Promotion codes can be assigned to lead, prospect, and customer records.
code.name: code

codePattern.description: You enter code patterns using the following components in any order you choose:    * [A.#] – This adds a number of random letters in the code.    * [N.#] – This adds a number of random numbers in the code.    * [AN.#] – This adds a number of random alphanumeric characters to the code.    * Hard-coded alphanumeric characters. Do not enclose these in square brackets.    * Dashes (-)Note: The following letters and numbers cannot be used in coupon codes: 1, 0, I, L, O.For example, the code ABC-[AN.3]-[A.3]-[N.3] would generate codes like:    * ABC-J3N-FLN-647    * ABC-45F-KPM-958    * ABC-5MP-PQA-874When creating your code pattern, make sure that the pattern you give has enough variables to provide the number of unique codes you need for your promotion.
codePattern.name: codePattern

description.description: Set the description for the promotion code.
description.name: description

discount.externalId.description: Reference a value in a user defined discount list. To create new values, click Lists > Accounting > Items > New > Discount.
discount.externalId.name: discount.externalId

discount.internalId.description: Reference a value in a user defined discount list. To create new values, click Lists > Accounting > Items > New > Discount.
discount.internalId.name: discount.internalId

discount.name.description: Reference a value in a user defined discount list. To create new values, click Lists > Accounting > Items > New > Discount.
discount.name.name: discount.name

discountType.description: Define whether the value entered for Rate is calculated as a percentage or as an absolute discount value. If the value entered is not a percent sign, the discount rate is applied as an absolute discount value. For example, 10% would result in a ten percent discount on the item whereas 10 would result in a ten dollar discount on the item.
discountType.name: discountType

displayLineDiscounts.description: Check this box if you want to show the promotion discount as line items in transactions. The discount will appear as a line beneath qualifying items on the transaction.You must check this box and select a percentage discount in order to show strikeout pricing on Web store orders. A flat rate promotion applies to the total order.If you clear this box, the promotion discount will be shown in the transaction total.Note: If you use line discount promotions, when you apply the promotion to a transaction, you must click Calculate to create the discount line before saving the transaction.
displayLineDiscounts.name: displayLineDiscounts

endDate.description: Set the end date for this promotion code.
endDate.name: endDate

excludeItems.description: If set to true, then this promotion code applies to all items except those you add. If set to false, the promotion code can only be used for the items added.
excludeItems.name: excludeItems

freeShipMethod.externalId.description: Select a shipping method from the list that will be offered for free on eligible transactions.
freeShipMethod.externalId.name: freeShipMethod.externalId

freeShipMethod.internalId.description: Select a shipping method from the list that will be offered for free on eligible transactions.
freeShipMethod.internalId.name: freeShipMethod.internalId

freeShipMethod.name.description: Select a shipping method from the list that will be offered for free on eligible transactions.
freeShipMethod.name.name: freeShipMethod.name

isInactive.description: If true, inactivates the promotion code.
isInactive.name: isInactive

isPublic.description: Check this box to be able to select this promotion on transactions for any customer.If you do not check this box, only customers associated with the partners you select below are able to use this promotion.
isPublic.name: isPublic

minimumOrderAmount.description: Enter the amount that the customer must spend before the promotion code becomes valid.If you use the Multiple Currencies feature, you can set a different minimum order amount for each currency in which you do business.
minimumOrderAmount.name: minimumOrderAmount

name.description: Enter the name for this promotion.Note: This is the name used for internal and reporting use only. The coupon code you want customers to use on sales transactions is entered in the Coupon Code field on the Codes subtab.
name.name: name

numberToGenerate.description: Enter the number of coupon codes you want to generate with your code pattern.
numberToGenerate.name: numberToGenerate

rate.description: Set the rate of discount for this item.
rate.name: rate

startDate.description: Set the start date for the promotion code.
startDate.name: startDate

type.value.description: Select a shipping method from the list that will be offered for free on eligible transactions.
type.value.name: type.value

useType.value.description: Choose whether you are entering a multiple-use coupon code that can be used any number of times by any number of customers, or single-use coupon codes that can only be used in one transaction by a single customer.
useType.value.name: useType.value
